author: Lisa-Rene
body: It’s not available on either of my brokerages but I put an order in for ROBK which actually could be a fun penny stock play for a few days. And maybe RLX calls. It’s a vaping company from China 🤢 I personally have bought shares of AAP instead of AAPL and PAYX when I wanted PYPL on the Schwab stock slices platform.
